intro: Galium ruwenzoriense, commonly known as the Ruwenzori stellaria, is a flowering plant native to the high-altitude regions of East Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its small, white or pale pink flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant typically grows in rocky or grassy habitats at elevations above 2,500 meters. It has slender, branched stems and opposite, lance-shaped leaves. Due to its restricted distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endemic species.
